text: @marklevinshow You’re an absolute moron! It’s not even the same drug. This is for malaria. The virus is called COVID-19 for a reason. COrona VIrus Disease - 2019. You people are scumbags. Also, this is a HIPAA violation. Keep drinking the kool-aid.
